channel.title: New Life Live with Steve Arterburn
channel.description: New Life Live! is America's #1 Christian counseling call-in show. Author and New Life Ministries founder, Steve Arterburn, along with his tag-team of co-hosts, offer advice and address issues concerning spiritual, relational and emotional issues within our culture today. Tag-team counselors: Dr. Henry Cloud, Dr. John Townsend, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. David Stoop, Rev. Milan Yerkovich, Chris Williams, Dr. Alice Benton and Dr. Sheri Keffer. Call New Life Ministries at 1-800-639-5433.
channel.itunes:summary: New Life Live! is America's #1 Christian counseling call-in show. Call New Life Ministries at 1-800-639-5433.

item.title: New Life Live: November 4, 2022
item.description:
Topics: Sexual Intimacy, Forgiveness, Affairs, Adult Children Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. Jim Burns Caller Questions: My 69yo husband with Parkinson’s demands sex once a week despite being impotent.  My niece won’t talk to me after I offended her; how much time should I give her?  Can you explain more about an exercise on forgiveness in your book Healing

The post New Life Live: November 4, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Sexual Intimacy, Forgiveness, Affairs, Adult Children
Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. Jim Burns

Caller Questions:

  1. My 69yo husband with Parkinson’s demands sex once a week despite being impotent. 
  2. My niece won’t talk to me after I offended her; how much time should I give her? 
  3. Can you explain more about an exercise on forgiveness in your book Healing is a Choice? 
  4. My adult daughters discovered my husband had been having an affair for 36yrs. 

Suggested Resources:
Forgiving Our Fathers and Mothers
100 Days To Freedom from Anger
Healing Is a Choice

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.

How do we navigate her triggers?  Restore was lifechanging for me!  I'm in my 60's and engaged. I'm choosing to love but don't have feelings of

The post New Life Live: November 2, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Sexual Addiction, PTSD, Triggers, Betrayal, Engagement, Dating, Boundaries, Siblings, Schizophrenia
Hosts: Chris Williams, Dr. Alice Benton, Amanda Anderson

Caller Questions:

  1. I came into my marriage with sexual addiction and caused my wife to have PTSD with my disclosure. How do we navigate her triggers? 
  2. Restore was lifechanging for me! 
  3. I’m in my 60’s and engaged. I’m choosing to love but don’t have feelings of love. Is this a red flag? 
  4. How do I set boundaries with family? Also, how do I get help for my brother who has schizophrenia? 

Suggested Resources:
Worthy of Her Trust
How We Love
One Year Bible for Women
Emotional Freedom Workbook
Take Your Life Back

item.title: New Life Live: November 1, 2022
item.description:
Topics: Halloween, Christian Walk, Childhood Trauma, Sexual Abuse, Brain Issues, Intimacy Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. Jim Burns Caller Questions: Since the Bible talks about abstaining from the appearance of evil, Christians shouldn't participate in Halloween.  I was sexually abused as a child and couldn’t play with other kids; can you explain what happens in the brain when this happens?  On

The post New Life Live: November 1, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Halloween, Christian Walk, Childhood Trauma, Sexual Abuse, Brain Issues, Intimacy
Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. Jim Burns

Caller Questions:

  1. Since the Bible talks about abstaining from the appearance of evil, Christians shouldn’t participate in Halloween. 
  2. I was sexually abused as a child and couldn’t play with other kids; can you explain what happens in the brain when this happens? 
  3. On Halloween, Christians get it right by being accepting and kind to odd-looking strangers who come to their door. 
  4. Do I stay with my husband or check out? He only communicates sexually. 

Suggested Resources:
One Year Bible for Women
One Year Bible for Men
Every Man’s Bible
How We Love

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.

item.title: New Life Live: October 31, 2022
item.description:
Topics: Affairs, Separation, Adult Children, Counseling, Siblings, Bullying Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Alice Benton, Marc Cameron Caller Questions: My husband packed up his car and left after I found out he had an emotional affair. I’ve been extremely critical of him; is it too late for us?  Should I tell my adult kids not to go to the restaurant where the woman

The post New Life Live: October 31, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Affairs, Separation, Adult Children, Counseling, Siblings, Bullying
Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Alice Benton, Marc Cameron

Caller Questions:

  1. My husband packed up his car and left after I found out he had an emotional affair. I’ve been extremely critical of him; is it too late for us? 
  2. Should I tell my adult kids not to go to the restaurant where the woman works who had an affair with my husband? My kids don’t know he had an affair. 
  3. How can I know if I need counseling? What are the signs? 
  4. How do I lovingly tell my brother that he has hurt family members? He is a bully. 

Suggested Resources:
Worthy of Her Trust
Healing Is a Choice
One Year Bible for Women

item.description:
Topics: Addictions, Marijuana, Boundaries, Grief, Dating, Childhood Trauma, Forgiveness  Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Alice Benton, Milan Yerkovich Caller Questions: How do we do tough love with our 19yo son who lives with us and smokes pot? He has been charged with a misdemeanor.  My abusive husband died 7yrs ago, but I can’t get past being terrified of men. Where do I go from here? 

The post New Life Live: October 28, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Addictions, Marijuana, Boundaries, Grief, Dating, Childhood Trauma, Forgiveness 
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Alice Benton, Milan Yerkovich

Caller Questions:

  1. How do we do tough love with our 19yo son who lives with us and smokes pot? He has been charged with a misdemeanor. 
  2. My abusive husband died 7yrs ago, but I can’t get past being terrified of men. Where do I go from here? 
  3. Although I can minister to others and God delivered me from drugs and abuse from my prostitute mom, I still don’t believe God cares for me. 

Suggested Resources:
Take Your Life Back
Understanding and Loving Your Child who Smokes Pot
How We Love

item.description:
Topics: Parenting, Blended Families, Pornography, Adult Children, Christian Walk, Transgender, Boundaries, Codependency Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Alice Benton, Chris Williams Caller Questions: What’s the right thing to do? I want to tell my 9yo daughter that my husband is not her biological dad, but my husband doesn’t want me to.  My 25yo son struggles with a porn addiction. How can I help the Christian

The post New Life Live: October 27, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Parenting, Blended Families, Pornography, Adult Children, Christian Walk, Transgender, Boundaries, Codependency
Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Alice Benton, Chris Williams

Caller Questions:

  1. What’s the right thing to do? I want to tell my 9yo daughter that my husband is not her biological dad, but my husband doesn’t want me to. 
  2. My 25yo son struggles with a porn addiction. How can I help the Christian girl he is living with? 
  3. Where in the Bible does it say to call someone by the gender name they prefer? 
  4. The COVID lockdown was a blessing to us because we had our college kids at home sharing the dinner table with us. How do we re-engage back in the real world? 
  5. I’m reading Boundaries and standing up to my paranoid-schizophrenic wife; is it right for me to do that? 

Suggested Resources:
How We Love
Every Man’s Battle
Every Man’s Bible
One Year Bible for Women

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.

item.description:
Topics: Affairs, Childhood Trauma, Career, Job Loss, Self Worth, Divorce Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Alice Benton, Dr. Jacqui Mack-Harris Caller Questions: What is generational trauma? I don't want to pass on to my children the trauma from my husband's adultery or my childhood abuse.  I lost my great job and now I can't take care of myself. I really don't know

The post New Life Live: October 26, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Affairs, Childhood Trauma, Career, Job Loss, Self Worth, Divorce

Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Alice Benton, Dr. Jacqui Mack-Harris

Caller Questions:

  1. What is generational trauma? I don’t want to pass on to my children the trauma from my husband’s adultery or my childhood abuse. 
  2. I lost my great job and now I can’t take care of myself. I really don’t know who I am or where to go from here. 
  3. How can I salvage my marriage? My husband tells me every day that he is miserable and wants to leave me. 

Suggested Resources:
How We Love
Forgiving What You’ll Never Forget
Boundaries
Take Your Life Back

item.content:encoded:
Topics: Spiritual Warfare, Parenting, Christian Walk, Dating, Alcohol, Parent Issues 
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Chris Williams

Caller Questions:

  1. I need spiritual warfare help for my 9yo disabled daughter who says she sees children who aren’t there and they tell her to do bad things. 
  2. Is there any difference between listening to an audio Bible versus reading the Bible? 
  3. How do I get out of my on-again, off-again relationship with my girlfriend? I have bipolar disorder and am a recovering alcoholic. 
  4. How do I show my Christian parents I love them while their drinking is leading them down the wrong path? 

Suggested Resources:

One Year Bible for Men
Life Recovery Bible
Understanding and Loving a Person with Alcohol or Drug Addiction

The post New Life Live: October 21, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Adult Children, Estrangement, Father Issues, Sexual Abuse, Drug Addiction, Siblings
Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. Jim Burns

Caller Questions:

  1. What can I do if my 31yo twin sons stop talking to me for months even though they say they love me? 
  2. We are newlyweds, but I’ve never met my father-in-law. 
  3. My brother-in-law molested my daughter when she was a child, and my husband didn’t do anything. She is now a 35yo meth addict and is going to jail; what can I do? 
  4. I promised my parents before they passed that I would stay close to my brother who raped me, but he wants no contact. Am I breaking my word? 

Suggested Resources:
Every Man’s Bible
How We Love
Forgiving Our Fathers and Mothers
Life Recovery Bible
Healing Is a Choice

The post New Life Live: October 18, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Emotional Affairs, Lying, Forgiveness, Pornography, Adult Children, Abandonment, Father Issues
Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. Jim Burns

Caller Questions:

  1. I caught my wife sexting and lying about it; how do I forgive her?
  2. Like your first caller, my wife had affairs and my marriage was unable to be fixed. 
  3. I had a porn addiction, and reading Every Young Man’s Battle helped me to commit to making changes! 
  4. My 22yo daughter gained eighty pounds since getting married, and I saw a half-empty vodka bottle. Where do I start with her without getting her upset? 
  5. I am an ecstatic new grandfather, and then hit an emotional pothole. Why is being abandoned by my dad coming up now? 

Suggested Resources:
Life Recovery Bible
Life Recovery Workbook
Every Young Man’s Battle
Every Man’s Bible
Healing Is a Choice

item.description:
Topics: Separation, Narcissists, Friendship, Boundaries, 12 Steps, Emotional Abuse, Divorce Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Becky Brown, Milan Yerkovich Caller Questions: What should I do to stop my wife from divorcing me? She just moved out due to our arguments.  I'm a pleaser in a friendship with a narcissist who always plays the victim; how do I put up healthy boundaries?  Steve, would you repeat your

The post New Life Live: October 17, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: Separation, Narcissists, Friendship, Boundaries, 12 Steps, Emotional Abuse, Divorce
Hosts: Steve Arterburn, Becky Brown, Milan Yerkovich

Caller Questions:

  1. What should I do to stop my wife from divorcing me? She just moved out due to our arguments. 
  2. I’m a pleaser in a friendship with a narcissist who always plays the victim; how do I put up healthy boundaries? 
  3. Steve, would you repeat your concise steps of recovery you talked about on the New Life cruise?
  4. How do I start all over again after I divorced my abusive husband? 

Suggested Resources:
How We Love
Understanding and Loving a Person with Narcissistic Personality Disorder
One Year Bible for Women
100 Days to Freedom from Shame

item.content:encoded:

  5. My estranged daughter sent me a disturbing text; what do you think she is saying?

The post New Life Live: October 3, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
item.content:encoded:
Topics: 12-step Recovery, Self Worth, Alcohol, Christian Walk, Drug Addiction, Codependency
Hosts: Becky Brown, Dr. Jacqui Mack-Harris, Chris Williams

Caller Questions:

  1. Is it true my brokenness sets me up for unhappiness? 
  2. My husband says I act like I’m better than others; how do I change? 
  3. Is it best to avoid going to functions because I get out of control when I drink? 
  4. I felt trapped in a bad marriage until my pastor shared Proverbs 6:16-19. 
  5. Do I give my adult children updates about their meth-addicted brother, or do I minimize it? 
  6. I facilitate a recovery group; should I use materials that say addiction is a sin or a disease? 

Suggested Resources:
How We Love
Changes That Heal
Understanding and Loving a Person with Alcohol or Drug Addiction
Life Recovery Bible
